title: Refund Process
body: Go to My Orders and click on Request Refund. Refunds take 5 to 7 days after approval.

title: Payment Failure
body: Check internet and card details, then retry. If payment deducted but order failed, refund arrives in 3 to 5 days.

title: Login Issues
body: Check Caps Lock, clear cache, or use another browser.If still failing, click Forgot Password or contact support.

title: Password Reset
body: Click Forgot Password, enter email/phone, and follow the link.

title: Account Deactivation
body: Go to Settings then Account click on Deactivate. Data and history will be removed. Reactivate within 30 days or email for permanent deletion.

title: Order Tracking
body: Open My Orders click on Track Shipment.Use tracking ID for updates. If stuck over 48 hrs, contact support.

title: Product Not Delivered
body: Check tracking ID. If marked Delivered but not received, share order ID + address. We'll investigate and arrange replacement/refund.

title: Cancel Order
body: Go to My Orders click on Cancel before shipment. If shipped, refuse delivery. Refund starts once cancellation confirmed.

title: Subscription Renewal
body: Open Subscriptions then Manage Plan click on Renew. Update payment method if failed. For issues, share plan ID.

title: Contact Support
body: Restart app, clear cache, and update version.If issue persists, send screenshot to techsupport@company.com
